text: The Latvia national futsal team represents Latvia in international futsal completions. They are yet to feature at the FIFA Futsal World Cup and they are co-hosting the UEFA Futsal Championship with Lithuania in 2026 where they'll make their debut. == Competition history == ===FIFA
